channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 54B20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 14, 05:30 - 07:00 UTC

Oct 24, 23:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 14/11/2024 05:30 UTC
End time : 14/11/2024 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack 54B20 will be unreachable during the maintenance
Service improvement :As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack 54B20 to rack 54B22

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - LIM0301A01B
item.description:
Nov 5, 15:19 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 05/11/2024 10:34 UTC
End time : 05/11/2024 15:16 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in rack LIM0301A01B were temporarily unresponsive.
Root cause : Hardware materiel issue
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 5, 13:23 UTC
Update - No impact observed on the majority of the servers in rack LIM0301A01B.
Our technical teams are currently working on the remaining impacted servers.

Nov 5, 11:21 UTC
Identified - We would like to inform you that we are having an ongoing incident.
Our teams are working tirelessly to resolve this incident once and for all.

Start time : 05/11/2024 10:34 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in rack LIM0301A01B are no longer responding.
Root cause : Incident due to an electrical issue.

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

Thank you for your understanding.
